nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 4am, then a chance of freezing rain and patchy fog. Mostly cloudy. Low around 17, with temperatures rising to around 27 overnight. South wind 2 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 8am, then rain between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 41, with temperatures falling to around 38 in the afternoon. West wind 10 to 31 mph, with gusts as high as 54 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Tuesday Night
nws.shortForecast: Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy. Low around 8, with temperatures rising to around 10 overnight. Northwest wind 17 to 31 mph, with gusts as high as 54 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 16. North wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow. Cloudy, with a low around 9. Southeast wind 7 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 22. West wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -9. Northwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near -1. Northwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Cloudy, with a low around -9. North wind 6 to 10 mph.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 3. East wind 6 to 9 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Snow then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow before midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around -10. Southeast wind around 9 mph.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 13. Southeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 2. Southwest wind around 10 mph.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 18.
